CVE-2009-1729.title: Sun Java System Communications Express Input Validation Flaw in 'search.xml' and 'UWCMain' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-1729.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Communications Express. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'search.xml' and 'UWCMain' scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sun Java System Communications Express software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Some demonstration exploit URLs are provided:https://[target]/uwc/abs/search.xml?bookid=e11e46531a8a0&j_encoding=UTF-8&uiaction=quickaddcontact&entryid=&valueseparator=%3B&prefix=abperson_&stopalreadyselected=1&isselchanged=0&idstoadd=&selectedbookid=&type=abperson%2Cgroup&wcfg_groupview=&wcfg_searchmode=&stopsearch=1&expandgroup=&expandselectedgroup=&expandonmissing=&nextview=&bookid=e11e46531a8a0&actionbookid=e11e46531a8a0&searchid=7&filter=entry%2Fdisplayname%3D*&firstentry=0&sortby=%2Bentry%2Fdisplayname&curbookid=e11e46531a8a0&searchelem=0&searchby=contains&searchstring=Search+for&searchbookid=e11e46531a8a0&abperson_givenName=aa&abperson_sn=aa&abperson_piEmail1=a%40a.com&abperson_piEmail1Type=work&abperson_piPhone1=11&abperson_piPhone1Type=work&quickaddprefix=abperson_&abperson_displayName=%3Cscript%3Ealert%28%27xss2%27%29%3C%2Fscript%3E%2C+%3Cscript%3Ealert%28%27xss1%27%29%3C%2Fscript%3E&abperson_entrytype=abperson&abperson_memberOfPIBook=e11e46531a8a0http://[target]/uwc/base/UWCMain?anon=true&calid=test@test.com&caltype=temporaryCalids&date=20081223T143836Z&category=All&viewctx=day&temporaryCalendars=test@test.com%27;alert(%27hello%27);a=%27The vendor was notified on January 9, 2009.The SCS team from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/sun-communications-express
CVE-2009-1729.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sun Java System Communications Express software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-1761.title: CA ARCserve Backup Input Validation Flaw in Message Engine Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-1761.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA ARCserve Backup. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target message engine to crash.iViZ Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1761.extra: A remote user can cause the message engine to crash.

CVE-2009-1762.title: Novell GroupWise WebAccess Input Validation Flaw in Login Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-1762.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise WebAccess. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The login page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the GroupWise software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'GWAP.version', 'User.Theme.index', and 'User.lang' fields are affected.The vendor was notified on January 6, 2009.Scott White of Secure State reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1762.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the GroupWise software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-1796.title: Sun Java System Portal Server Input Validation Bug in Error Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-1796.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Portal Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The error page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sun Java System Portal Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2009-1796.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sun Java System Portal Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-1832.title: Mozilla Firefox Bugs in JavaScript Engine and Browser Engine May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1832.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger memory corruption errors and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mozilla SeaMonkey is also affected.Bob Clary, Jesse Ruderman, Alexander Sack, Bret McMillan, Tomeo Vizoso, Matt McCutchen, Martijn Wargers, Adam Hauner, and Igor Bukanov reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-1832.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1832.title: Mozilla Thunderbird Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1832.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Thunderbird. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send specially crafted e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-1392, CVE-2009-1832, CVE-2009-1833, CVE-2009-1838]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user. Thunderbird is affected if JavaScript is enabled [not the default configuration].A remote user can send specially crafted e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary scripting code with chrome privileges on the target user's system [CVE-2009-1841]. The system is not vulnerable in the default configuration. The system may be vulnerable if the user has installed an add-on which adds a similarly implemented feature and then enables JavaScript in mail messages.
CVE-2009-1832.extra: A remote user can create an e-mail message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1833.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1836.title: Mozilla Thunderbird Proxy Response Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code in the Context of an SSL-Protected Domain
CVE-2009-1836.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Thunderbird. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed on the target user's system within the context of an SSL-protected domain.A remote proxy server can return a specially crafted non HTTP 200 message in response to a CONNECT request to cause arbitrary code to be executed within the context of the SSL-protected domain of the request. The code will be incorrectly rendered within the context of the HTTP Host header in the original request.Mozilla SeaMonkey is affected.Microsoft security researchers Shuo Chen, Ziqing Mao, Yi-Min Wang, and Ming Zhang reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1836.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed on the target user's system within the context of an SSL-protected domain.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send specially crafted e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-1392, CVE-2009-1832, CVE-2009-1833, CVE-2009-1838]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user. Thunderbird is affected if JavaScript is enabled [not the default configuration].A remote user can send specially crafted e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary scripting code with chrome privileges on the target user's system [CVE-2009-1841]. The system is not vulnerable in the default configuration. The system may be vulnerable if the user has installed an add-on which adds a similarly implemented feature and then enables JavaScript in mail messages.
CVE-2009-1838.extra: A remote user can create an e-mail message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1840.title: Mozilla Firefox XUL Script Policy Can By Bypassed By Remote Users
CVE-2009-1840.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can bypass certain content restrictions.The browser does not check content-loading policies before loading external script files into XUL documents. A remote user may be able to bypass policy restrictions.Mozilla SeaMonkey is affected.Wladimir Palant reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1840.extra: A remote user can bypass certain content restrictions.

CVE-2009-1841.title: Mozilla Thunderbird Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1841.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Thunderbird. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send specially crafted e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-1392, CVE-2009-1832, CVE-2009-1833, CVE-2009-1838]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user. The system is not vulnerable in the default configuration. The system may be vulnerable if the user has installed an add-on which adds a similarly implemented feature and then enables JavaScript in mail messages.
CVE-2009-1841.extra: A remote user can create an e-mail message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1855.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1855.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint), Jun Mao and Ryan Smith of iDefense Labs, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Global Security Research Team, the Apple Product Security Team, Matthew Watchinski of Sourcefire VRT, Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Mark Dowd of the IBM Internet Security Systems X-Force, Will Dormann of CERT, and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-1855.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1863.title: Adobe Flash Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2009-1863.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted Flash content or URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A privilege escalation flaw can cause code execution [CVE-2009-1863].A heap overflow can cause code execution [CVE-2009-1864].A null pointer flaw can cause code execution [CVE-2009-1865].A stack overflow can cause code execution [CVE-2009-1866].A specially crafted link or dialog box may allow a remote user to hijack the target user's session [CVE-2009-1867].A URL parsing heap overflow can cause code execution [CVE-2009-1868].An integer overflow can cause code execution [CVE-2009-1869].When the target user saves a SWF file to the local disk, a remote user may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2009-1870].Adobe AIR is also affected.akehu of Tencent Security Center, Mike Wroe, iDefense, Chen Chen of Venustech, Joran Benker, Roee Hay of IBM Rational Application Security, and Microsoft Vulnerability Research Program (MSVR) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-1863.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2009-1879.title: Adobe Flex SDK Input Validation Bug in 'index.template.html' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-1879.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flex SDK. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The default 'index.template.html' file does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running pages created with the Adobe Flex software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/Flex/index.template.html?"/></object><script>alert('XSS')</script>The vendor was notified on June 29, 2009.Adam Bixby of Gotham Digital Science reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1879.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the pages created using the Adobe Flex SDK software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-1888.title: Samba smbd Access Control Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Certain Access Controls
CVE-2009-1888.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba smbd. A remote authenticated user can bypass certain access controls.A remote authenticated user with write access to a file but without permission to modify the file's access control list (ACL) may be able to modify the ACL in a certain case. If the parameter "dos filemode" is set to "yes" in the 'smb.conf' file, the access control check reads uninitialized memory to determine access rights. Jeremy Allison reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1888.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass certain access controls.

CVE-2009-1890.title: Apache mod_proxy stream_reqbody_cl() Infinite Loop Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-1890.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache mod_proxy. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted Content-Length value to cause the stream_reqbody_cl() function in 'modules/proxy/mod_proxy_http.c' to enter an infinite loop.
CVE-2009-1890.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2009-1891.title: Apache mod_deflate Connection State Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-1891.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache mod_deflate. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The mod_deflate module continues to compress large files after the network connection has been closed. A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to consume excessive CPU resources for a temporary period of time.Francois Guerraz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1891.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to consume excessive CPU resources.

CVE-2009-1904.title: Ruby BigDecimal Conversion Bug May Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-1904.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can supply a specially crafted value to a function that converts BigDecimal objects into Float numbers to trigger a segmentation fault.
CVE-2009-1904.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2009-1905.title: IBM DB2 LDAP Authentication Bug Lets Remote Users Access the Database
CVE-2009-1905.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A remote user can access the database.On systems configured with LDAP-based authentication, where the LDAP server allows anonymous binds, and group lookup functionality via the LDAP security plug-in modules (IBMLDAPauthserver), a remote user can connect to the target database without authenticating.
CVE-2009-1905.extra: A remote user can access the database without authenticating.

CVE-2009-1907.title: Claroline Input Validation Flaw in 'notfound.php' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-1907.body: A vulnerability was reported in Claroline. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The '/claroline/linker/notfound.php' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the HTTP Referer field before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted request that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Claroline software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on May 5, 2009.Gerendi Sandor Attila reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://gsasec.blogspot.com/2009/05/claroline-v1811-cross-site-scripting.html
CVE-2009-1907.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Claroline software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-1917.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1917.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer (IE). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted HTML page can access a previously deleted object to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1917]. Peter Vreugdenhil of VeriSign iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted HTML page can conduct certain table operations to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1918]. Wushi and Ling of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted HTML page can access a previously deleted object to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1919]. Peter Vreugdenhil reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2009-1917.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1918.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1918.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer (IE). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted HTML page can access a previously deleted object to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1917]. Peter Vreugdenhil of VeriSign iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted HTML page can conduct certain table operations to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1918]. Wushi and Ling of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted HTML page can access a previously deleted object to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1919]. Peter Vreugdenhil reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2009-1918.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1919.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1919.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer (IE). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted HTML page can access a previously deleted object to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1917]. Peter Vreugdenhil of VeriSign iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted HTML page can conduct certain table operations to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1918]. Wushi and Ling of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted HTML page can access a previously deleted object to trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2009-1919]. Peter Vreugdenhil reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2009-1919.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-1922.title: Windows Message Queuing Service (MSMQ) NULL Pointer Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-1922.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Message Queuing Service (MSMQ). A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can send a specially crafted IOCTL request to the Message Queuing service to trigger a null pointer flaw and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges. The code will run with Local System privileges.Nikita Tarakanov of Positive Technologies Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1922.extra: A local user can obtain Local System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-1929.title: Windows Remote Desktop Connection Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1929.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) server can return specially crafted data to the connected Remote Desktop Connection client to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-1929]. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Wushi of Team509 reported this vulnerability via Zero Day Initiative.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the Microsoft Terminal Services Client ActiveX control and trigger a heap overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2009-1133]. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Yamata Li reported this vulnerability.Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection is formerly known as Terminal Services Client.Remote Desktop Connection Client for Mac 2.0 is also affected.
CVE-2009-1929.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-1934.title: Sun Java System Web Server Input Validation Hole in Reverse Proxy Plug-in Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-1934.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Web Server in the Reverse Proxy Plug-in. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Reverse Proxy Plug-in does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sun Java System Web Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2009-1934.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sun Java System Web Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-1935.title: FreeBSD Kernel Integer Overflow in Pipe Implementation Lets Local Users Read System Memory
CVE-2009-1935.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can view portions of system memory.A local user can trigger an integer overflow in the pipe implementation to read pages of memory of other processes or of the kernel.Pieter de Boer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1935.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.

CVE-2009-1943.title: SafeNet SoftRemote Stack Overflow in IKE Service Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-1943.body: A vulnerability was reported in SafeNet SoftRemote. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the IKE service on UDP port 62514 to trigger a stack overflow in 'ireIke.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.The vendor was notified on October 28, 2008.Ruben Santamarta reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-09-024
CVE-2009-1943.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System privileges.

CVE-2009-1959.title: Irssi Underflow in event_wallops() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-1959.body: A vulnerability was reported in Irssi. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote server can send a specially crafted (empty) command to the connected client to trigger an off-by-one underflow and cause the target client to crash.The vulnerability resides in the event_wallops() function in 'fe-common/irc/fe-events.c'.The original advisory is available at:http://xorl.wordpress.com/2009/05/28/irssi-event_wallops-off-by-one-readwrite/xorl reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-1959.extra: A remote server can cause the connected client to crash.

CVE-2009-2026.title: CA Software Delivery Buffer Overflow in Data Transport Services Library Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2026.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Software Delivery. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in 'dtscore.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Orlando Padilla and Peter Silberman of Breakpoint Security reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2009-2026.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-2046.title: Cisco Video Surveillance Camera Discloses Arbitrary Files to Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2009-2046.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Cisco Video Surveillance 2500 Series IP Cameras. A remote authenticated user can view arbitrary files on the target camera.A remote authenticated user can access the target camera via TCP port 80 or TCP 443 (depending on the configuration) and view arbitrary files on the target device.A non-privileged remote authenticated user can exploit this to obtain elevated privileges on the target device.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsu05515 and CSCsr96497 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2046.extra: A remote authenticated user can view arbitrary files on the target camera.

CVE-2009-2047.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express Express Administration Pages Permit Script Injection and Directory Traversal Attacks
CVE-2009-2047.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Contact Center Express. A remote authenticated user can inject arbitrary scripting code. A remote authenticated user can access files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can invoke the Customer Response Solutions (CRS) Administration interface to view, modify, or delete arbitrary files on the target system [CVE-2009-2047]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsw76644 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can inject JavaScript into the Cisco Unified CCX database [CVE-2009-2048]. When the database is accessed by the target user, arbitrary scripting code will be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the device in the security context of that device. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsw76649 to this vulnerability.The following product versions are affected:* Cisco Customer Response Solution (CRS) versions 3.x, 4.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Unified IP Interactive Voice Response (Cisco Unified IP IVR) versions 3.x, 4.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Unified CCX 4.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Unified IP Contact Center Express versions 3.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Customer Response Applications versions 3.x* Cisco IP Queue Manager (IP QM) versions 3.xNational Australia Bank's Security Assurance team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2047.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can view, modify, and delete files on the target system.

CVE-2009-2048.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express Express Administration Pages Permit Script Injection and Directory Traversal Attacks
CVE-2009-2048.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Contact Center Express. A remote authenticated user can inject arbitrary scripting code. A remote authenticated user can access files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can invoke the Customer Response Solutions (CRS) Administration interface to view, modify, or delete arbitrary files on the target system [CVE-2009-2047]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsw76644 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can inject JavaScript into the Cisco Unified CCX database [CVE-2009-2048]. When the database is accessed by the target user, arbitrary scripting code will be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the device in the security context of that device. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsw76649 to this vulnerability.The following product versions are affected:* Cisco Customer Response Solution (CRS) versions 3.x, 4.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Unified IP Interactive Voice Response (Cisco Unified IP IVR) versions 3.x, 4.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Unified CCX 4.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Unified IP Contact Center Express versions 3.x, 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x* Cisco Customer Response Applications versions 3.x* Cisco IP Queue Manager (IP QM) versions 3.xNational Australia Bank's Security Assurance team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2048.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can view, modify, and delete files on the target system.

CVE-2009-2055.title: Cisco IOS XR BGP Update Processing Flaw Lets Remote BGP Peers Deny Service
CVE-2009-2055.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote router can send a Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) route update with a specially crafted BGP Update message attribute to cause the target router to reset BGP peering sessions from the BGP peer.The peering session will flap until the remote user stops sending the attribute.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtb42995 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: This vulnerability and the subsequently reported IOS XR BGP vulnerabilities (Alert ID 1022756; CVE-2009-1154 and CVE-2009-2056) have been combined under Cisco Bug ID CSCtb18562.]
CVE-2009-2055.extra: A remote user can cause the BGP peering sessions to be reset.

CVE-2009-2056.title: Cisco IOS XR BGP Update Processing Flaws Let Remote BGP Peers Deny Service
CVE-2009-2056.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted (long) BGP update message to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-1154].Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtb05382 to this vulnerability.If the Cisco IOS XR BGP process is configured to prepend a large number of AS Numbers to the AS path, the BGP process will crash [CVE-2009-2056].Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtb12726 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: These two vulnerabilities and the previously reported IOS XR BGP vulnerability (Alert ID 1022739; CVE-2009-2055) have been combined under Cisco Bug ID CSCtb18562.]
CVE-2009-2056.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash and reload.

CVE-2009-2108.title: Git Virtualization Support Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-2108.body: A vulnerability was reported in Git. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted arguments to cause the target git-daemon to enter an infinite loop.
CVE-2009-2108.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2009-2119.title: F5 FirePass Input Validation Flaw in Unspecified Password Fields Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-2119.body: A vulnerability was reported in F5 FirePass. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the F5 FirePass device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Unspecified password fields are affected.The vendor was notified on May 14, 2009.Sjoerd Resink of Fox-IT BV reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:https://www.fox-it.com/nl/nieuws-en-events/nieuws/laatste-nieuws/nieuwsartikel/f5-firepass-cross-site-scripting-vulnerability/106
CVE-2009-2119.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the F5 FirePass device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-2121.title: Google Chrome Buffer Overflow in Processing HTTP Responses Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2121.body: A vulnerability was reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote server can return a specially crafted HTTP response to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user running the chrome application.The vulnerability resides in the browser kernel.The Google Chrome security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2121.extra: A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-2185.title: strongSwan X.509 RDN and Time String Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-2185.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in strongSwan. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted X.509 certificate Relative Distinguished Name (RDN) data to cause the target pluto IKE daemon to crash and restart.A remote user can send specially crafted X.509 certificate ASN.1 UTCTIME and GENERALIZEDTIME time strings to cause the target pluto IKE daemon to crash and restart.Orange Labs vulnerability research team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-2185.extra: A remote user can cause the target pluto IKE daemon to crash and restart.

CVE-2009-2188.title: Mac OS X Multiple Image and File Processing Bugs Permit Remote Code Execution
CVE-2009-2188.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image or file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted image with an embedded ColorSync profile can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-1726]. Chris Evans of the Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Canon RAW image can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-1728]. Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger a heap overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1722]. Lurene Grenier of Sourcefire VRT and Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger an uninitialized memory access error in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1721].A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger an integer overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1720].An image with specially crafted EXIF metadata can trigger a buffer overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-2188]. Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.A remote user can return a specially crafted AppleTalk response packet to trigger a buffer overflow in the kernel [CVE-2009-2193]. Ilja van Sprundel from IOActive reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted XML content can trigger a buffer overflow in the Perl Compatible Regular Expressions (PCRE) library used by XQuery in the processing of character classes in regular expressions [CVE-2008-0674].
CVE-2009-2188.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2189.title: Apple Time Capsule and AirPort Base Station Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service or Access Ostensibly Protected Hosts
CVE-2009-2189.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Time Capsule and AirPort Base Station. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can access hosts behind the device.A remote user on the local network can send a large number of IPv6 Router Advertisement (RA) and Neighbor Discovery (ND) packets to cause the target device to restart [CVE-2009-2189]. Shoichi Sakane of the KAME project, Kanai Akira of Internet Multifeed Co., Shirahata Shin and Rodney Van Meter of Keio University, and Tatuya Jinmei of Internet Systems Consortium, Inc. reported this vulnerability.If a system behind the NAT function on the device has a portmapped FTP server, a remote user on that system can query services behind the device [CVE-2010-0039]. Sabahattin Gucukoglu reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCP reply to cause the target device to stop responding to network traffic [CVE-2010-1804]. Systems configured as a bridge or configured in Network Address Translation (NAT) mode with a default host enabled are affected. Stefan R. Filipek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2189.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to restart or stop responding to network traffic.A remote user behind the deivce can access other hosts behind the device in certain cases.

CVE-2009-2190.title: Mac OS X Networking Bugs Let Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-2190.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can open a large number of connections to an inetd-based launchd service to cause launchd to stop processing incoming connections to the target service [CVE-2009-2190]. The system must be restarted to return to normal operations.A local user can send messages containing file descriptors to a socket that has no receiver to cause the target system to shutdown [CVE-2009-2194]. Bennet Yee of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2190.extra: A remote user can cause launchd to stop processing connections for the target service.A local user can cause the target system to shutdown.

CVE-2009-2193.title: Mac OS X Multiple Image and File Processing Bugs Permit Remote Code Execution
CVE-2009-2193.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image or file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted image with an embedded ColorSync profile can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-1726]. Chris Evans of the Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Canon RAW image can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-1728]. Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger a heap overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1722]. Lurene Grenier of Sourcefire VRT and Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger an uninitialized memory access error in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1721].A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger an integer overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1720].An image with specially crafted EXIF metadata can trigger a buffer overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-2188]. Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.A remote user can return a specially crafted AppleTalk response packet to trigger a buffer overflow in the kernel [CVE-2009-2193]. Ilja van Sprundel from IOActive reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted XML content can trigger a buffer overflow in the Perl Compatible Regular Expressions (PCRE) library used by XQuery in the processing of character classes in regular expressions [CVE-2008-0674].
CVE-2009-2193.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2195.title: Apple Safari Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2195.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.On Windows-based systems, specially crafted long text strings can trigger a heap overflow in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-2468]. Will Drewry of Google Inc reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted floating point numbers can trigger a buffer overflow in WebKit [CVE-2009-2195]. The vendor discovered this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2195.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2198.title: Apple GarageBand Flaw Lets Remote Users Modify Safari Cookie Preferences
CVE-2009-2198.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple GarageBand. A remote user can set cookies on the target user's Safari browser.When GarageBand is opened, the Safari accept cookies preferences are changed to "any". This may allow third parties to track the target user's web visits.The default preference is "only from sites I visit".
CVE-2009-2198.extra: A remote user can set cookies on the target user's Safari browser.

CVE-2009-2200.title: Apple Safari Unknown Plug-in Type Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2009-2200.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will display a specially crafted plug-in dialog. When the target user clicks "Go" from the dialog box, arbitrary file URLs may be loaded, allowing the remote user to obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's system.Alexios Fakos of n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2200.extra: A remote user obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2201.title: Xsan May Display the User's Password
CVE-2009-2201.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xsan. A physically local user may be able to view the target user's password.When screensharing via the Xsan Admin application, a physically local user viewing the target user's display may be able to view the target user's password in an error dialog.Ben Greisler of Kadimac Corp Macintosh Integrators reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2201.extra: A physically local user may be able to view the target user's password.

CVE-2009-2205.title: Java Web Start Stack Overflow in Command Launcher Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2205.body: A vulnerability was reported in Java Web Start. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Java Web Start application that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in the command launcher and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2205.extra: A remote user can create a Java Web Start application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2206.title: Apple iPhone Heap Overflow in Processing AAC and MP3 Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2206.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iPhone. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted AAC or MP3 file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Tobias Klein of trapkit.de reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2206.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2208.title: FreeBSD SIOCSIFINFO_IN6 IOCTL Access Bug Lets Local Users Modify IPv6 Interface Properties
CVE-2009-2208.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD kernel. A local user can modify IPv6 interface settings.The SIOCSIFINFO_IN6 ioctl does not properly check user permissions. A local user can modify IPv6 interface properties, including changing the link MTU and disabling the interface.IPv4 is not affected.Hiroki Sato reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2208.extra: A local user can modify interface properties, including disabling the interface.

CVE-2009-2211.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Username/Password Disclosure
CVE-2009-2211.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Rational ClearQuest. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user may be able to obtain username and password information.The CQWeb server does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2009-2211]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Rational ClearQuest software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user may be able to obtain username and password information [CVE-2009-2212].
CVE-2009-2211.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Rational ClearQuest software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user may be able to obtain username and password information.

CVE-2009-2214.title: Citrix Secure Gateway Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-2214.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix Secure Gateway. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the target server to cause excessive CPU consumption on the target server. The target server may also refuse any further connections.The Citrix Access Gateway appliance is not affected when configured to act as a Citrix Secure Gateway.The Qualys Vulnerability Research team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2214.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-2256.title: NETGEAR DG632 Router Web Interface Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2009-2256.body: A vulnerability was reported in the NETGEAR DG632 Router. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send a specially crafted HTTP POST request for '/cgi-bin/firmwarecfg' to cause the target web management service to stop responding. A power reset is required to return the service to normal operation.A remote user on the WAN interface can exploit this flaw if Remote Management is enabled.The vendor was notified on June 12, 2009.Tom Neaves reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2256.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target web service.

CVE-2009-2257.title: NETGEAR DG632 Router Discloses File Source Contents to Remote Users
CVE-2009-2257.body: A vulnerability was reported in the NETGEAR DG632 Router. A remote user can obtain the source code of some files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to bypass authentication and view the source code of certain files on the target device. A remote user can also determine valid directories and file names on the target system.The vendor was notified on June 12, 2009.Tom Neaves reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2257.extra: A remote user can obtain the source code of some files on the target system.

CVE-2009-2258.title: NETGEAR DG632 Router Discloses File Source Contents to Remote Users
CVE-2009-2258.body: A vulnerability was reported in the NETGEAR DG632 Router. A remote user can obtain the source code of some files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to bypass authentication and view the source code of certain files on the target device. A remote user can also determine valid directories and file names on the target system.The vendor was notified on June 12, 2009.Tom Neaves reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2258.extra: A remote user can obtain the source code of some files on the target system.

CVE-2009-2265.title: FCKeditor input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Upload Arbitrary Files
CVE-2009-2265.body: A vulnerability was reported in FCKeditor. A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.Several connector modules in the 'editor\filemanager\connectors' directory do not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can submit a specially crafted request to upload files to arbitrary locations on the target system. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the target system.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.Version 3.0 is not affected.Several scripts in the '_samples' directory permit cross-site scripting attacks.The vendor was notified on May 4, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2009-007.htmlVinny Guido reported this vulnerability via oCERT.
CVE-2009-2265.extra: A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system, which can lead to arbitrary code execution.

CVE-2009-2275.title: cPanel Input Validation Flaw in 'lastvisit.html' Lets Remote Users View Files
CVE-2009-2275.body: A vulnerability was reported in cPanel. A remote user can view files on the target system.The 'lastvisit.html' page does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system with the privileges of the web service.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]:2082/frontend/x3/stats/lastvisit.html?domain=../../../../../../../../ etc/ passwdThe original advisory is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/9039Black Dream of Security Rules reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2275.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2009-2288.title: Nagios Input Validation Flaw in 'statuswml.cgi' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2009-2288.body: A vulnerability was reported in Nagios. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the 'statuswml.cgi' script to execute arbitrary commands on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target web service.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:https://[target]/nagios/cgi-bin/statuswml.cgi?ping=173.45.235.65%3Becho+%24PATHPaul reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2288.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2009-2316.title: IBM Tivoli Identity Manager Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-2316.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Identity Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Tivoli Identity Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The self-service interface and the console interface is affected.
CVE-2009-2316.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Tivoli Identity Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-2324.title: FCKeditor input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Upload Arbitrary Files
CVE-2009-2324.body: A vulnerability was reported in FCKeditor. A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.Several connector modules in the 'editor\filemanager\connectors' directory do not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can submit a specially crafted request to upload files to arbitrary locations on the target system. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the target system.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.Version 3.0 is not affected.Several scripts in the '_samples' directory permit cross-site scripting attacks.The vendor was notified on May 4, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2009-007.htmlVinny Guido reported this vulnerability via oCERT.
CVE-2009-2324.extra: A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system, which can lead to arbitrary code execution.

CVE-2009-2334.title: WordPress Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2009-2334.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in WordPress. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user obtain potentially sensitive information.The 'admin.php?page=' plugin does not properly check privileges [CVE-2009-2334]. A remote authenticated non-administrative user can supply a specially crafted request to inject specially crafted scripting code when reconfiguring plugins. This can be exploited to include local files and view the contents of plugin configuration pages. The user may be able to modify plugin options.The login page responds differently to authentication failures due to an invalid password than failures due to an invalid username [CVE-2009-2335]. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.The forgotten mail interface responds differently to authentication failures due to an invalid password than failures due to an invalid username [CVE-2009-2336]. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.The vendor was notified on June 4, 2009.Fernando Arnaboldi and Jose Orlicki from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2334.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WordPress software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2009-2344.title: Sourcefire 3D Sensor and Defense Center Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-2344.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sourcefire 3D Sensor and Defense Center. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can submit a specially crafted request to the 'user.cgi' script to gain read and write access with administrator privileges.Other scripts on the device may also be affected.The vendor was notified on May 5, 2009.Gregory Duchemin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2344.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-2346.title: Asterisk IAX2 Call Number Consumption Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-2346.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can consume all available IAX2 call numbers to prevent additional calls from being accepted.The vendor was notified on June 22, 2008.Noam Rathaus and Blake Cornell separately reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2346.extra: A remote user can prevent the target system from accepting calls.

CVE-2009-2347.title: LibTIFF Integer Overflows in tiff2rgba and rgb2ycbcr Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2347.body: A vulnerability was reported in LibTIFF. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted TIFF image file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application using LibTIFF.The cvt_whole_image() function in the tiff2rgba tool and the tiffcvt() function in the rgb2ycbcr tool are affected. A specially crafted width and height value can trigger the flaw.The vendor was notified on May 22, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2009-012.htmlTielei Wang reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2347.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-2361.title: osTicket Staff Username Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2009-2361.body: A vulnerability was reported in osTicket. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input in staff username values. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor was notified on March 25, 2009.Adam Baldwin of nGenuity Information Services reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2361.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2009-2372.title: Drupal User Signature Input Validation Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2372.body: A vulnerability was reported in Drupal. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted user signature value. If the administrator changes the format of a page that the user has commented on to a format with the PHP filter enabled, the remote user can load the page to execute execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the web service.Gerhard Killesreiter of the Drupal security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2372.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system in certain cases.

CVE-2009-2379.title: BIGACE Include File Bug Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2379.body: A vulnerability was reported in BIGACE. A remote user can include and execute local files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to cause the target system to include and view or potentially execute arbitrary files located on the target system.If the files contain PHP code, the PHP code, including operating system commands, will run with the privileges of the target web service.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://target]/bigace/public/index.php?cmd=../../../../../../../../etc/passwd%00&id=-1_tsearch_lenCWD@rBe reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2379.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system and may be able to execute PHP code and operating system commands from files located on the target system with the privileges of the target web service.

CVE-2009-2405.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Input Validation Holes in the JMX Console and Web Console Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-2405.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The JMX Console [CVE-2009-1380] and the Web Console [CVE-2009-2405] do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the JBoss software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Swatej Kumar reported the Web Console vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2405.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the JBoss software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-2406.title: Linux Kernel eCryptfs Stack Overflow Lets Local Users Deny Service and Potentially Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-2406.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a stack overflow in the parse_tag_11_packet() function in 'fs/ecryptfs/keystore.c' in the eCryptfs subsystem to cause a system crash.A local user may be able to exploit this flaw to gain elevated privileges.
CVE-2009-2406.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2009-2408.title: Network Security Services Library NULL Character Flaw in Common Name Field Lets Remote Users Spoof Certficiates
CVE-2009-2408.body: A vulnerability was reported in Network Security Services. A remote user can spoof certificates of arbitrary sites. Mozilla Firefox is affected.A remote user can create a certificate with a specially crafted Common Name field that contains a NULL character. Once the certificate is signed by a Certificate Authority, the certificate can be used to spoof a target site's certificate.Dan Kaminsky reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2408.extra: A remote user can spoof certificates of arbitrary sites.

CVE-2009-2409.title: Network Security Services Library Supports Certificates With Weak MD2 Hash Signatures
CVE-2009-2409.body: A vulnerability was reported in Network Security Services. A remote user may be create certificates that appear to be valid for arbitrary sites. OpenSSL, GnuTLS, Mozilla Firefox, and other applications are affected.A remote user that is able to create a certificate that has the same MD2 hash signature as a trusted Certificate Authority root certificate can issue valid SSL certificates for arbitrary sites.Dan Kaminsky reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2409.extra: A remote user may be able to issue valid SSL certificates for arbitrary sites in certain cases.

CVE-2009-2411.title: Subversion Heap Overflow in libsvn_delta Library Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2411.body: A vulnerability was reported in Subversion. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user with commit access on the target server can supply a specially crafted binary delta (svndiff stream) to trigger a heap overflow in the libsvn_delta library and execute arbitrary code on the target server.A remote server can trigger a heap overflow on the target client when the client performs a checkout or update.The vulnerability is due to an underlying flaw in the APR library used by Subversion.Matt Lewis of Google reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2411.extra: A remote client with commit privileges can execute arbitrary code on the target server.A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the target client.

CVE-2009-2431.title: WordPress Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2009-2431.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in WordPress. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user obtain potentially sensitive information.The 'admin.php?page=' plugin does not properly check privileges [CVE-2009-2334]. A remote authenticated non-administrative user can supply a specially crafted request to inject specially crafted scripting code when reconfiguring plugins. This can be exploited to include local files and view the contents of plugin configuration pages. The user may be able to modify plugin options.The login page responds differently to authentication failures due to an invalid password than failures due to an invalid username [CVE-2009-2335]. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.The forgotten mail interface responds differently to authentication failures due to an invalid password than failures due to an invalid username [CVE-2009-2336]. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.The vendor was notified on June 4, 2009.Fernando Arnaboldi and Jose Orlicki from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2431.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WordPress software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2009-2432.title: WordPress Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2009-2432.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in WordPress. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user obtain potentially sensitive information.The 'admin.php?page=' plugin does not properly check privileges [CVE-2009-2334]. A remote authenticated non-administrative user can supply a specially crafted request to inject specially crafted scripting code when reconfiguring plugins. This can be exploited to include local files and view the contents of plugin configuration pages. The user may be able to modify plugin options.The login page responds differently to authentication failures due to an invalid password than failures due to an invalid username [CVE-2009-2335]. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.The forgotten mail interface responds differently to authentication failures due to an invalid password than failures due to an invalid username [CVE-2009-2336]. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.The vendor was notified on June 4, 2009.Fernando Arnaboldi and Jose Orlicki from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2432.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WordPress software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2009-2434.title: IBM AIX syscall Buffer Overflow Has Unspecified Impact
CVE-2009-2434.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. The impact was not specified.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the syscall() function.

CVE-2009-2445.title: Sun Java System Web Server Discloses JSP Source Code to Remote Users
CVE-2009-2445.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Sun Java System Web Server. A remote user can view JSP source code.A remote user can request a specially crafted URL to cause the server to display the source code of the requested JSP file.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/hello.jsp::$DATAOnly Windows-based systems are affected.The original advisory is available at:http://isowarez.de/SunOne_Webserver.txtNikolaos Rangos reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2445.extra: A remote user can view JSP source code.

CVE-2009-2453.title: Citrix XenApp Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Access Policy
CVE-2009-2453.body: A vulnerability was reported in XenApp (Presentation Server). A remote user can bypass access policy.An access policy defined using the Access Gateway filters may not be applied.Only Hotfix Rollup Pack 3 is affected.Systems using Access Gateway Advanced Edition filters are affected.
CVE-2009-2453.extra: A remote user can bypass access policy.

CVE-2009-2468.title: Apple Safari Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2468.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.On Windows-based systems, specially crafted long text strings can trigger a heap overflow in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-2468]. Will Drewry of Google Inc reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted floating point numbers can trigger a buffer overflow in WebKit [CVE-2009-2195]. The vendor discovered this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2468.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2470.title: Mozilla Firefox SOCKS5 DNS Name Length Error Lets Remote Users Corrupt Data
CVE-2009-2470.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause data corruption.A remote SOCKS5 proxy can return a reply with a DNS name longer than 15 characters to cause the subsequent data stream to be corrupted.Andrej Andolsek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2470.extra: A remote user can cause data corruption.

CVE-2009-2479.title: Mozilla Firefox Bug in Processing Unicode Characters Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-2479.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to crash.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/9158Andrew Haynes and Simon Berry-Byrne reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: The bug was originally reported as a stack overflow. However, the vendor has responded that it is not a stack overflow and that they "do not believe that this represents an exploitable vulnerability."]
CVE-2009-2479.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to crash.

CVE-2009-2482.title: NetBSD OpenPAM passwd(1) May Let Certain Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-2482.body: A vulnerability was reported in NetBSD. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system in certain cases.The pam_unix authentication module allows a local non-root user with knowledge of the root password to invoke passwd(1) and change the password.Thomas Getzke and Hubert Feyrer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-2482.extra: A local non-root user with knowledge of the root password can change the root password.

CVE-2009-2483.title: NetBSD proplib Null Pointer Dereference in Processing XML Data Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-2483.body: A vulnerability was reported in NetBSD. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply specially crafted XML data to a driver that uses proplib to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause a kernel panic.A non-defined element (e.g., "<number>") in the external XML form can trigger this flaw.
CVE-2009-2483.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2009-2494.title: Microsoft Active Template Library (ATL) Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2494.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Active Template Library (ATL). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. Several products and components that use ATL are affected.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an error in the Load method of the IPersistStreamInit interface to invoke a memcopy with user-supplied data, causing arbitrary code to be executed [CVE-2008-0020]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Robert Freeman of IBM ISS X-Force reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory free error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-2494]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Ryan Smith of VeriSign iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.Affected components include Microsoft Outlook Express, Windows Media Player, the DHTML Editing Component ActiveX Control, the Microsoft MSWebDVD ActiveX Control, and the Windows ATL Component.
CVE-2009-2494.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2496.title: Microsoft Office Web Components Buffer Overflows in ActiveX Control Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-2496.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory allocation error in the Office Web Components ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Internet Security and Acceleration Server 2004 SP3 and 2006 SP1, Microsoft BizTalk Server 2002, Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003 SP1, and Microsoft Office Small Business Accounting 2006 are also affected.Peter Vreugdenhil of Zero Day Initiative and Sean Larsson of VeriSign iDefense Labs each reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-2496.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-2505.title: Microsoft Internet Authentication Service Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Gain Privileges of the Target User
CVE-2009-2505.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Authentication Service. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.
