CVE-2009-3899.title: Solaris Sockets Direct Protocol Driver Flaw Lets Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-3899.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote or local user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Sockets Direct Protocol (SDP) driver (sdp(7D)) to consume all available kernel memory.No applications bundled with Solaris are affected. However, third-party applications that make use of the SDP driver may be affected.
CVE-2009-3899.extra: A remote or user can consume all available kernel memory on the target system.

CVE-2009-3904.title: CubeCart Session Management Flaw Lets Remote Users Gain Administrative Access
CVE-2009-3904.body: A vulnerability was reported in CubeCart. A remote user can gain administrative access to the target application.A remote user can send empty sessID, HTTP_USER_AGENT, and X_CLUSTER_CLIENT_IP values to gain administrative access to the target application.Bogdan Calin reported this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on October 20, 2009.
CVE-2009-3904.extra: A remote user can gain administrative access on the target application.

CVE-2009-3936.title: Citrix Online Plug-ins Lets Remote Users Spoof SSL Endpoints
CVE-2009-3936.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix Online Plug-ins and ICA Clients for XenApp and XenDesktop. A remote user can spoof SSL endpoints.A remote user can create a specially crafted certificate that, once signed by a Certificate Authority, allows the user to spoof an SSL endpoint to obtain ICA authentication data and information from the target user.[Editor's note: This issue is separate from the SSL prefix vulnerability.]
CVE-2009-3936.extra: A remote user can spoof SSL endpoints.

CVE-2009-3937.title: Solaris TCP Sockets Memory Leak Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-3937.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can exploit a flaw in Solaris TCP sockets to trigger a memory leak and cause denial of service conditions on the target system.
CVE-2009-3937.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2009-3951.title: Adobe Flash Player Memory Corruption Errors Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-3951.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create a specially crafted JPEG file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-3794]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-3796, CVE-2009-3797, CVE-2009-3798, CVE-2009-3799, and CVE-2009-3800].A remote user can access file names on target systems running Windows by exploiting the Flash Player ActiveX control [CVE-2009-3951].Flash Professional CS3 and CS4 are also affected.Jim Cheng of EffectiveUI, Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, Damian Put via TippingPoint, Will Dormann of CERT, and Manuel Caballero and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-3951.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2009-3953.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Flaws Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2009-3953.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An array boundary issue in U3D support can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3953].A DLL-loading vulnerability in 3D can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3954].A memory corruption vulnerability can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3955].A script injection vulnerability exists [CVE-2009-3956].A null-pointer dereference vulnerability can cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2009-3957].A buffer overflow vulnerability in the Download Manager can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3958].An integer overflow vulnerability in U3D support can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3959].Secunia, Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs, Code Audit Labs via iDefense, stratsec, Didier Stevens, Will Dormann of CERT, and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-3953.extra: A remote user can create a PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or cause the target user's reader to crash.

CVE-2009-3954.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Flaws Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service

A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An array boundary issue in U3D support can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3953].A DLL-loading vulnerability in 3D can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3954].A memory corruption vulnerability can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3955].A script injection vulnerability exists [CVE-2009-3956].A null-pointer dereference vulnerability can cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2009-3957].A buffer overflow vulnerability in the Download Manager can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3958].An integer overflow vulnerability in U3D support can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3959].Secunia, Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs, Code Audit Labs via iDefense, stratsec, Didier Stevens, Will Dormann of CERT, and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-3954.extra: A remote user can create a PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or cause the target user's reader to crash.

CVE-2009-3959.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Flaws Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2009-3959.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An array boundary issue in U3D support can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3953].A DLL-loading vulnerability in 3D can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3954].A memory corruption vulnerability can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3955].A script injection vulnerability exists [CVE-2009-3956].A null-pointer dereference vulnerability can cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2009-3957].A buffer overflow vulnerability in the Download Manager can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3958].An integer overflow vulnerability in U3D support can cause code execution [CVE-2009-3959].Secunia, Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs, Code Audit Labs via iDefense, stratsec, Didier Stevens, Will Dormann of CERT, and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-3959.extra: A remote user can create a PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or cause the target user's reader to crash.

CVE-2009-3962.title: 2Wire Gateway Can Be Crashed By Remote Users Via a Specially Crafted XLST Request
CVE-2009-3962.body: A vulnerability was reported in 2Wire Gateway. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can submit a specially crafted HTTP request to the remote management interface to cause the target device to reboot.A demonstration exploit request is provided:https://[target]:50001/xslt?page=%0d%0aThe vendor was notified on September 9, 2009.hkm reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-3962.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reboot.

CVE-2009-3980.title: Mozilla Seamonkey Bugs in JavaScript Engine and Browser Engine Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-3980.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Seamonkey. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jeremy Lea, Jesse Ruderman, David Mandelin, Gary Kwong, Jason Orendorff, and Igor Bukanov reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-3980.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-3980.title: Mozilla Firefox Bugs in JavaScript Engine and Browser Engine Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-3980.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jeremy Lea, Jesse Ruderman, David Mandelin, Gary Kwong, Jason Orendorff, and Igor Bukanov reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-3980.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-3986.title: Mozilla Seamonkey 'window.opener' Flaw May Let Remote Users Gain Chrome Privileges
CVE-2009-3986.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Seamonkey. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed with chrome privileges on the target user's browser.A remote user can cause a content window to be opened by a chrome window via the 'window.opener' property and then content in the new window can access functions in the chrome window. On some configurations, arbitrary JavaScript code can be executed with chrome privileges.The vendor indicates that on a standard browser configuration, a remote user cannot exploit this flaw to execute arbitrary code. If an add-on opens arbitrary or user-affected content in a vulnerable manner, remote code execution may be possible.David James reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-3986.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-3986.title: Mozilla Firefox 'window.opener' Flaw May Let Remote Users Gain Chrome Privileges
CVE-2009-3986.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed with chrome privileges on the target user's browser.A remote user can cause a content window to be opened by a chrome window via the 'window.opener' property and then content in the new window can access functions in the chrome window. On some configurations, arbitrary JavaScript code can be executed with chrome privileges.The vendor indicates that on a standard browser configuration, a remote user cannot exploit this flaw to execute arbitrary code. If an add-on opens arbitrary or user-affected content in a vulnerable manner, remote code execution may be possible.David James reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-3986.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-3987.title: Mozilla Firefox GeckoActiveXObject Discloses Installed COM Objects to Remote Users
CVE-2009-3987.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can determine the COM objects installed on the target user's system.The GeckoActiveXObject exception messages differ based on whether or not the requested COM object's ProgID is present in the target user's system registry. A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will determine the installed COM objects.Gregory Fleischer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-3987.extra: A remote user can determine the COM objects installed on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-3987.title: Mozilla Seamonkey GeckoActiveXObject Discloses Installed COM Objects to Remote Users
CVE-2009-3987.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Seamonkey. A remote user can determine the COM objects installed on the target user's system.The GeckoActiveXObject exception messages differ based on whether or not the requested COM object's ProgID is present in the target user's system registry. A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will determine the installed COM objects.Gregory Fleischer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-3987.extra: A remote user can determine the COM objects installed on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-3999.title: HP Power Manager Username and Password Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-3999.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Power Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted username and password data to the login script to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-3999.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4000.title: HP Power Manager Username and Password Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4000.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Power Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted username and password data to the login script to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4000.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4002.title: Adobe Shockwave Integer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4002.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Shockwave file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on December 23, 2009 and December 29, 2009.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4002.extra: A remote user can create Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4003.title: Adobe Shockwave Integer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4003.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Shockwave file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on December 23, 2009 and December 29, 2009.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4003.extra: A remote user can create Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4006.title: FTP Serv-U Boundary Error in TEA Decoding Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4006.body: A vulnerability was reported in FTP Serv-U. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger a boundary error in the TEA decoding algorithm and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on November 5, 2009.Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4006.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4009.title: PowerDNS Recursor Buffer Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4009.body: A vulnerability was reported in PowerDNS Recursor. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target service to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4009.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-4033.title: acpid Log File Permissions May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-4033.body: A vulnerability was reported in acpid on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The acpid daemon may create its log file ('/var/log/acpid') with random permissions on some Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems. If the log file is created with the set user id (setuid) or set group id (setgid) permissions and with world-writable permissions, a local user can modify and execute the file to gain elevated privileges.The vulnerability is due to a Red Hat-specific patch (acpid-1.0.4-fd.patch) included in the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 acpid package. The upstream version is not affected.
CVE-2009-4033.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4034.title: PostgreSQL NULL Character Flaw in Certificate Processing Lets Remote Users Spoof Certficiates
CVE-2009-4034.body: A vulnerability was reported in PostgreSQL. A remote user can spoof certificates of arbitrary clients and servers.A remote user can create a certificate with a specially crafted field that contains a NULL character. Once the certificate is signed by a Certificate Authority, the certificate can be used to spoof a target client or server certificate.Systems that have SSL enabled and perform certificate name validation or client certificate authentication may be affected.
CVE-2009-4034.extra: A remote user can spoof certificates of arbitrary clients and servers.

CVE-2009-4035.title: Xpdf Buffer Overflow in FoFiType1::parse Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4035.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file with an embedded Type 1 font that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in FoFiType1::parse() in the Type 1 font parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Petr Gajdos and Christian Kornacker of SUSE reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4035.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4105.title: TYPSoft FTP Server APPE and DELE Command Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-4105.body: A vulnerability was reported in TYPSoft FTP Server. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can issue specially crafted APPE and DELE commands in the same socket connection to cause the target service to crash.leinakesi at gmail.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4105.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2009-4114.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 'kl1.sys' IOCTL Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-4114.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kaspersky Anti-Virus. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can issue a specially crafted IOCTL to 'kl1.sys' to cause the target system to crash.Heurs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4114.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2009-4139.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server Request Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2009-4139.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Network Satellite Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The Red Hat Network (RHN) Satellite and Spacewalk services do not properly validate user-supplied. A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by a target authenticated user, will take actions on the target site acting as the target user.Christian Johansson of Bitsec AB and Thomas Biege of the SUSE Security Team independently reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4139.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4142.title: PHP Input Validation Flaw in htmlspecialchars() Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-4142.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The htmlspecialchars() function does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before returning the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the PHP software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://d.hatena.ne.jp/t_komura/20091004/1254665511Moriyoshi (hello at iwamot dot com) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4142.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the PHP software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4146.title: FreeBSD rtld Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2009-4146.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke the run-time link-editor (rtld) and supply specially crafted environment variables to set user id (setuid) or set group id (setgid) binaries to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The LD_PRELOAD, LD_LIBMAP, LD_LIBRARY_PATH, LD_LIBMAP_DISABLE, LD_DEBUG, and LD_ELF_HINTS_PATH variables are affected.Nikolaos Rangos (Kingcope) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4146.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4147.title: FreeBSD rtld Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2009-4147.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke the run-time link-editor (rtld) and supply specially crafted environment variables to set user id (setuid) or set group id (setgid) binaries to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The LD_PRELOAD, LD_LIBMAP, LD_LIBRARY_PATH, LD_LIBMAP_DISABLE, LD_DEBUG, and LD_ELF_HINTS_PATH variables are affected.Nikolaos Rangos (Kingcope) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4147.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4150.title: IBM DB2 dasauto Command Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-4150.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can invoke the dasauto command to enable or disable auto-starting of the DB2 administration server.Only Linux/UNIX-based systems are affected.
CVE-2009-4150.extra: A local user can cause disable the DB2 administration server from autostarting.

CVE-2009-4185.title: HP System Management Homepage Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-4185.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP System Management Homepage. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP System Management Homepage software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/proxy/smhui/getuiinfo?JS&servercert=%0064e43<script>alert(1)</script>7b3f58a689fRichard Brain of ProCheckUp Ltd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4185.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP System Management Homepage software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4187.title: Sun Java System Portal Server Gateway Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-4187.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Portal Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Gateway does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sun Java System Portal Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2009-4187.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sun Java System Portal Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4195.title: Adobe Illustrator Buffer Overflow in Processing DSC Comment Field Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4195.body: pyrokinesis from Nine:Situations:Group reported a vulnerability in Adobe Illustrator. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted EPS file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://retrogod.altervista.org/9sg_adobe_illuso.html
CVE-2009-4195.extra: A remote user can create an EPS file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4210.title: Windows Media Player Indeo Codec Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4210.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will launch the Indeo codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Paul Byrne of NGS Software, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, VeriSign iDefense Labs, and Dave Lenoe of Adobe reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4210.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4211.title: DISA UNIX Security Readiness Review (SRR) Evaluation Scripts Let Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2009-4211.body: A vulnerability was reported in DISA's UNIX Security Readiness Review (SRR) Evaluation Scripts. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.The scripts conduct a 'find' command search for certain named files and then invokes the files with root privileges. A local user can create a specially named executable file containing arbitrary code. When the SRR scripts are run, the arbitrary code will be executed with root privileges.The following filenames are executed: java -version openssl version php -v snort -V tshark -v vncserver -help wireshark -vIf a remote user is permitted to upload executable files with arbitrary file names, then this vulnerability may be exploited remotely.SRR scripts for other platforms were not evaluated.US-CERT was notified on September 21, 2009 and US-CERT VU #433821 was assigned.Frank Stuart reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4211.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary code with root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4212.title: Kerberos AES and RC4 Integer Underflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4212.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted ciphertext data to trigger an integer overflow in the AES and RC4 decryption operations of the MIT Kerberos crypto library and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2009-4212.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2009-4214.title: Ruby on Rails Input Validation Flaw in strip_tags() Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-4214.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby on Rails. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The strip_tags() function does not properly filter non-printable ascii characters from user-supplied input before displaying the input. For applications that use the strip_tags() function, a remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Ruby on Rails software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Gabe da Silveira reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4214.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Ruby on Rails software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4215.title: Panda Internet Security Unsafe File Permissions Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-4215.body: A vulnerability was reported in Panda Internet Security. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The software is configured to allow 'Full' access control to the 'Everyone' group. A local user can modify the files to include arbitrary code.Panda Global Protection 2010 is also affected.The vendor was notified on October 27, 2009 without response.Francis Provencher of Protek Research Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4215.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4235.title: acpid Log File Permissions May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-4235.body: A vulnerability was reported in acpid on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The acpid daemon may create its log file ('/var/log/acpid') with random permissions on some Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems. If the log file is created with the set user id (setuid) or set group id (setgid) permissions and with world-writable permissions, a local user can modify and execute the file to gain elevated privileges.The vulnerability is due to a Red Hat-specific patch (acpid-1.0.4-fd.patch) included in the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 acpid package. The upstream version is not affected.
CVE-2009-4235.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4241.title: RealPlayer Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4241.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted media content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted ASM RuleBook can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4241].A specially crafted GIF file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4242].Media with specially crafted HTTP chunk encoding can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-4243].A specially crafted media file can trigger a heap overflow in the SIPR Code [CVE-2009-4244].A specially crafted compressed GIF file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4245].A specially crafted skin file can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-4246].A specially crafted ASM RuleBook can trigger an overflow [CVE-2009-4247].A specially crafted RTSP set_parameter value can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2009-4248].A specially crafted SMIL file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4257].Evgeny Legerov, anonymous researchers via iDEFENSE Labs, and John Rambo and anonymous researchers via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4241.extra: A remote user can create media content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4242.extra: A remote user can create media content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4244.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted ASM RuleBook can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4241].A specially crafted GIF file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4242].Media with specially crafted HTTP chunk encoding can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-4243].A specially crafted media file can trigger a heap overflow in the SIPR Code [CVE-2009-4244].A specially crafted compressed GIF file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4245].A specially crafted skin file can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-4246].A specially crafted ASM RuleBook can trigger an overflow [CVE-2009-4247].A specially crafted RTSP set_parameter value can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2009-4248].A specially crafted SMIL file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4257].Evgeny Legerov, anonymous researchers via iDEFENSE Labs, and John Rambo and anonymous researchers via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2009-4245.title: RealPlayer Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4245.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted media content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted ASM RuleBook can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4241].A specially crafted GIF file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4242].Media with specially crafted HTTP chunk encoding can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-4243].A specially crafted media file can trigger a heap overflow in the SIPR Code [CVE-2009-4244].A specially crafted compressed GIF file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4245].A specially crafted skin file can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-4246].A specially crafted ASM RuleBook can trigger an overflow [CVE-2009-4247].A specially crafted RTSP set_parameter value can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2009-4248].A specially crafted SMIL file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-4257].Evgeny Legerov, anonymous researchers via iDEFENSE Labs, and John Rambo and anonymous researchers via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4245.extra: A remote user can create media content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4269.title: Oracle Industry Applications Bugs Let Remote Users Partially Deny Service, Access Data, and Modify Data
CVE-2009-4269.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle Industry Applications. A remote user can cause partial denial of service conditions. A remote user can partially modify or access data.The Health Sciences - Oracle Argus Safety [CVE-2010-3593] and Health Sciences - InForm [CVE-2009-4269] components are affected.The following researchers reported these and other Oracle vulnerabilities:Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security; Alexandr Polyakov of Digital Security; Alexey Sintsov of Digital Security Research Group; Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod, working with TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative; Andrey Labunets of Digital Security Research Group; Cris Neckar of Neohapsis, Inc.; Daniel Fahlgren; Esteban Martinez Fayo of Application Security, Inc.; Evdokimov Dmitriy of Digital Security Research Group; Karan Saberwal; Laszlo Toth; Maksymilian Arciemowicz of SecurityReason; Martin Rakhmanov of Application Security, Inc.; Matt Parcell of Accuvant; Monarch2020 of unsecurityresearch.com; Robert Clugston of Accuvant; Roberto Suggi Liverani of Security-Assessment.com; Rodrigo Rubira Branco (BSDaemon) via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative; and Sumit Siddharth from 7safe.
CVE-2009-4269.extra: A remote user can cause partial denial of service conditions.A remote user can partially modify or access data.

CVE-2009-4309.title: Windows Media Player Indeo Codec Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4309.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will launch the Indeo codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Paul Byrne of NGS Software, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, VeriSign iDefense Labs, and Dave Lenoe of Adobe reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4309.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4310.title: Windows Media Player Indeo Codec Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4310.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will launch the Indeo codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Paul Byrne of NGS Software, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, VeriSign iDefense Labs, and Dave Lenoe of Adobe reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4310.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4311.title: Windows Media Player Indeo Codec Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4311.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will launch the Indeo codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Paul Byrne of NGS Software, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, VeriSign iDefense Labs, and Dave Lenoe of Adobe reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4311.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4312.title: Windows Media Player Indeo Codec Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4312.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will launch the Indeo codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Paul Byrne of NGS Software, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, VeriSign iDefense Labs, and Dave Lenoe of Adobe reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4312.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4313.title: Windows Media Player Indeo Codec Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4313.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will launch the Indeo codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Paul Byrne of NGS Software, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, VeriSign iDefense Labs, and Dave Lenoe of Adobe reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-4313.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-4357.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Web Interface May Disclose Passwords in Certain Cases
CVE-2009-4357.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational ClearQuest. A remote user can obtain passwords in certain cases.When legacy URLs are used to automatically log in to CQWeb, the target user's password may be disclosed.
CVE-2009-4357.extra: A remote user can obtain password information in certain cases.

CVE-2009-4363.title: Horde Application Framework Input Validation Flaw in Administrator Scripts Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-4363.body: A vulnerability was reported in Horde Application Framework. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The administrator interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Horde Application Framework software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Users of Firefox browsers are affected.Juan Galiana Lara and Daniel Fernandez Bleda from Internet Security Auditors reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4363.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Horde Application Framework software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4376.title: Wireshark Buffer Overflow in Daintree SNA Parser and Bugs in SMB, SMB2, and IPMI Dissectors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2009-4376.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in the Daintree SNA file parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service. Versions 1.2.0 to 1.2.4 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted SMB and SMB2 data to cause the target service to crash.A remote user can send specially crafted IPMI data to cause the target service to crash. Only versions 1.2.0 to 1.2.4 on Windows-based systems are affected.
CVE-2009-4376.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-4406.title: APC Switched Rack PDU Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-4406.body: A vulnerability was reported in the APC Switched Rack PDU. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web administration login page ('login1') does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'login_username' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the APC device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on June 18, 2009.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/Forms/login1?login_username=<ScRiPt>alert('hello');</ScRiPt>Jamal Pecou reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4406.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the APC device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4420.title: BIG-IP ASM and PSM bd Daemon Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4420.body: A vulnerability was reported in BIG-IP. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the BIG-IP Application Security Manager (ASM) and Protocol Security Manager (PSM) bd daemon to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The following product versions are affected: * BIG-IP ASM versions 9.4.4 - 9.4.7 * BIG-IP ASM versions 10.0.0 - 10.0.1 * BIG-IP PSM versions 9.4.5 - 9.4.7 * BIG-IP PSM versions 10.0.0 - 10.0.1 The vendor assigned issue tracking number CR126690 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4420.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4445.title: Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) Filename Extension Parsing Configuration Error May Let Users Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2009-4445.body: Soroush Dalili reported a vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS). A user may be able to bypass security controls and cause the web server to execute files with non-executable filenames in certain cases.The IIS service incorrectly parses filenames that contain a semicolon character when determining the MIME type based on the filename extension. A local user can create an executable file (e.g., ASP file) with a specially crafted but non-executable filename that, when invoked via the web server, will cause the contents of the file to be executed with the privileges of the target web service.If a web application on the system allows remote users to upload files with user-controlled filenames, the remote user may be able to bypass the web application's filename extension security filters and upload an executable file with a non-executable extension.A demonstration exploit filename is provided: malicious.asp;.jpgThe report indicates that many web applications are affected.The vendor indicates that only IIS version 6 is affected.The original advisory is available at:http://soroush.secproject.com/downloadable/iis-semicolon-report.pdf
CVE-2009-4445.extra: A user may be able to cause the web server to execute files with non-executable filenames. The impact may depend on the users with access to the web server and/or on the applications running on the web server.

CVE-2009-4452.title: Kaspersky Internet Security Unsafe Access Control Configuration for BASES Folder Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-4452.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kaspersky Internet Security. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The BASES folder is configured to allow 'Full Control' privileges to the 'Everyone' group. A local user can modify some files in that directory to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with System privileges.The vendor was notified on July 16, 2009.Maxim A. Kulakov (ShineShadow) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4452.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4452.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus Unsafe Access Control Configuration for BASES Folder Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-4452.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kaspersky Anti-Virus. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The BASES folder is configured to allow 'Full Control' privileges to the 'Everyone' group. A local user can modify some files in that directory to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with System privileges.The vendor was notified on July 16, 2009.Maxim A. Kulakov (ShineShadow) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4452.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4455.title: Cisco ASA WebVPN Bookmark List Can Be Bypassed By Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2009-4455.body: David Eduardo Acosta Rodriguez of ISecAuditors reported vulnerability in Cisco ASA. A remote authenticated user can bypass the WebVPN bookmark list to access ostensibly protected resources on the internal network.A remote authenticated Clientless SSL VPN user can send a specially crafted URL to access internal network resources that are not listed on the WebVPN home page.Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtd73211 to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on December 9, 2009.[Editor's note: The vendor does not consider the WebVPN bookmark feature to be an access control feature.]
CVE-2009-4455.extra: A remote authenticated user can access ostensibly protected resources on the internal network.

CVE-2009-4484.title: MySQL Unspecified Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4484.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability was reported by Intevydis.Exploit code is available as part of the Vulndisco August 2009 release.The original advisory is available at:http://www.intevydis.com/blog/?p=106
CVE-2009-4484.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4484.title: yaSSL Buffer Overflow in Certificate Processing Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4484.body: A vulnerability was reported in yaSSL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially named certificate to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2009-4484.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4492.title: Ruby WEBrick Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject Terminal Commands
CVE-2009-4492.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby WEBrick. A remote user can cause arbitrary terminal commands to be executed on the target system.A remote user can supply a request containing specially crafted escape sequences that, when viewed from the log file via a terminal by the target user, will execute arbitrary terminal commands on the target terminal application.Some demonstration exploit commands are provided:curl -kis http://localhost/%1b%5d%32%3b%6f%77%6e%65%64%07%0aecho -en "GET /\x1b]2;owned?\x07\x0a\x0d\x0a\x0d" > payloadnc localhost 80 < payloadThe vendor was notified on approximately December 8, 2009.Giovanni "evilaliv3" Pellerano, Alessandro "jekil" Tanasi, and Francesco "ascii" Ongaro reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4492.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary terminal commands to be executed on the target system in certain cases.

CVE-2009-4536.title: Linux Kernel Input Validation Flaw in Intel PRO/1000 Linux Drivers Lets Remote Users Deny Service and Potentially Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2009-4536.body: A vulnerability was reported in the the Linux Kernel. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target e1000 or e1000e driver to crash.A remote user may also be able to send specially crafted data that will bypass the driver's fragment check and cause portions of invalid frames to be passed up to the networking stack.Eugene Teo reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4536.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2009-4537.title: Linux Kernel Input Validation Flaw in Realtek r8169 Ethernet Driver Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-4537.body: A vulnerability was reported in Linux Kernel. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send data with a specially crafted 'RxMaxSize' frame size value to cause the target Realtek r8169 Ethernet driver to crash.Fabian Yamaguchi reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4537.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2009-4654.title: Novell eDirectory Buffer Overflow in HTTPSTK Login Page Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4654.body: karak0rsan and murderkey from Hellcode Research reported a vulnerability in Novell eDirectory. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can submit specially crafted data to '/dhost/httpstk' to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://tcc.hellcode.net/sploitz/httpstk.txtkarak0rsan and murderkey from Hellcode Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4654.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-4662.title: Novell GroupWise WebAccess Input Validation Hole in 'User.Theme.index' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-4662.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise WebAccess. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The system does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'User.Theme.index' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the GroupWise software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Matt Foster of Netcraft, Ltd. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4662.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the GroupWise software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-4832.title: DESlock+ Lets Local Users Gain System Privileges
CVE-2009-4832.body: A vulnerability was reported in DESlock+. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System privileges.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/8983mu-b reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4832.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-4833.title: MySQL Connector/Net is Missing SSL Certificate Validation
CVE-2009-4833.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL Connector/Net. A remote user can conduct spoofing attacks.MySQL Connector/Net does not validate the remote server's digital certificate when using SSL. A remote user can conduct man-in-the-middle attacks to gain access to the ostensibly protected data.Wes Henderson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4833.extra: A remote user can conduct spoofing attacks to gain access to the ostensibly protected data stream.

CVE-2009-4879.title: Novell Access Manager Administration Console Lets Remote Autheticated Users Access System Files
CVE-2009-4879.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Access Manager. A remote authenticated user can access system files.A remote authenticated user can access system files via the Administration Console.A remote user with an Active Directory account can use X.509 authentication to authenticate when the account has been disabled.
CVE-2009-4879.extra: A remote authenticated user can access system files.A remote user with a disabled account can successfully authenticate in certain cases.

CVE-2009-4988.title: SAP Business One Stack Overflow in 'NT_Naming_Service.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-4988.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP Business One. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted GIOP request to the License Manager's 'NT_Naming_Service.exe' service on TCP port 30000 to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with SYSTEM privileges.SAP Business One 2007 is not affected.The vendor has been notified.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/9319Mike Arnold reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-4988.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-5022.title: LibTIFF Heap Overflow in OJPEG Decoder Lets Remote User's Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-5022.body: A vulnerability was reported in LibTIFF. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a heap overflow in the OJPEG decoder in 'tif_ojpeg.c' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.
CVE-2009-5022.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-5037.title: Cisco ASA Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service and Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2009-5037.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security controls.A remote user can send specially crafted LAN-to-LAN (aka L2L) IPsec sessions to cause unspecified denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-4692]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCth36592 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially rafted multicast traffic to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4691]. Cisco has assignd Bug IDs CSCtg61810 and CSCtg69742 to this vulnerability.A remote user may be able to send a specially crafted HEAD request to the Mobile User Security (MUS) service to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2010-4690]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte53635 to this vulnerability.The device does not properly preserve ACL behavior after a migration [CVE-2010-4688]. A remote user can send unspecified data to bypass access restrictions. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte46460 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP calls to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4689]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte20030 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP authentication requests to trigger a memory leak and consume excessive memory on the target device [CVE-2010-4682]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtf29867 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to bypass SMTP inspection [CVE-2010-4681]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte14901 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can view CIFS shares via WebVPN when CIFS file browing has been disabled [CVE-2010-4680]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsz80777 to this vulnerability.The device does not properly handle Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) connection failures [CVE-2010-4679]. A remote user can exhaust all available TCP sockets. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsz36816 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send data while the device is starting up to bypass access restrictions [CVE-2010-4678]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsy86769 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted request via emWeb for a document with a name that contains space characters to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4677]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsy08416 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send a high volume of IPSec traffic to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4676]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsx52748 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated users can bypass Telnet access restrictions [CVE-2010-4675]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsv40504 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted multicast traffic to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-4674]. CVE-2009-5097.title: Palm webOS JavaScript Directory Traversal Flaw Lets Remote Users Access Files on the Target Device
CVE-2009-5097.body: A vulnerability was reported in Palm webOS. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can supply specially crafted JavaScript that, when loaded by the target user, will access files on target user's system. The vulnerability can be exploited via e-mail.Demonstration exploit code is available (in an image) at:http://tlhsecurity.com/advisories/FA_Code.jpgThe original advisory is available at:http://tlhsecurity.blogspot.com/2009/10/palm-pre-webos-11-remote-file-access.htmlTownsend Ladd Harris reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-5097.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.
